sen.j: 北条 氏治（ほうじょう うじはる）は、河内国狭山藩の第4代藩主。
sen.e: Ujiharu HOJO was the fourth lord of the Sayama clan in Kawachi province.
Ujiharu HOJO was the fourth lord of the Sayama Domain in Kawachi Province.
sen.cmt: 「狭山藩」は人の集団ではなく土地のことを指していると思い、"Domain"にしました。用語集の指定に従い、Provinceと大文字にしました。
sen.e: Ujiharu HOJO was the fourth lord of the Sayama Domain in Kawachi Province.

sen.j: 寛永16年（1639年）、初代藩主・北条氏盛の次男・北条氏利の次男として生まれる。
sen.e: He was born in 1639 the second son of Ujitoshi HOJO who was the second son of the first lord of the clan, Ujimori HOJO.
He was born in 1639 as the second son of Ujitoshi HOJO, who was the second son of Ujimori HOJO, the first lord of the domain.
sen.cmt: 1639のあとに"as"を付け加えました。"clan"を"domain"にしました。
sen.e: He was born in 1639 as the second son of Ujitoshi HOJO, who was the second son of Ujimori HOJO, the first lord of the domain.

sen.j: 第3代藩主・北条氏宗には男子が無かったため、慶安元年（1648年）に婿養子となった。
sen.e: Ujiharu became the adapted son-in-law of Ujimune in 1648 since Ujimune HOJO, the third lord of the clan, did not have a son.
Ujiharu became the adapted son-in-law of Ujimune in 1648 since Ujimune HOJO, the third lord of the domain, did not have a son.
Ujiharu became the adapted son-in-law of Ujimune in 1648 since Ujimune HOJO, the third lord of the domain, did not have a son.

sen.j: 寛文10年（1670年）10月1日、氏宗が隠居したため、家督を継いで第4代藩主となる。
sen.e: He succeeded the family estate after Ujimune's retirement and became the fourth lord of the clan on October 1, 1670.
He succeeded the family headship after Ujimune's retirement and became the fourth lord of the domain on November 13, 1670.
sen.cmt: 「家督を継いで」の訳を、下記ウェブサイトに従い書き換えました。http://www.csse.monash.edu.au/~jwb/cgi-bin/wwwjdic.cgi?1E ・"clan"を"domain"にしました。・グレゴリオ暦に訂正しました。
sen.e: He succeeded the family headship after Ujimune's retirement and became the fourth lord of the domain on November 13, 1670.

sen.j: しかし、氏宗は将軍に謁見することが1度も無く、官位にも叙任されていなかった。
sen.e: However, Ujiharu never had an audience with the Shogun nor was appointed any officials.
However, Ujimune neither had an audience with the Shogun nor had any official ranks.
sen.cmt: ・原文に従い、"Ujiharu"を"Ujimune"に訂正しました。・"never"を"neither"にしました。・「官位に叙任」を"had any official ranks"と意訳しました。
sen.e: However, Ujimune neither had an audience with the Shogun nor had any official ranks.

sen.j: このため、老中の稲葉正則の反対があって家督相続が認められないという異例の状態が続いた。
sen.e: Therefore, Masanori INABA rejected Ujiharu's appointment to the lord; thus, an exceptional condition, in which the succession of Ujiharu to the position of the family head was not approved, continued for a while.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Since Roju (a member of shogun's council of elders) Masanori INABA opposed Ujiharu's succession to the family headship for that reason, an exceptional condition that Ujiharu was not allowed to succeed the family headship continued for a while.
sen.cmt: ・「老中」という言葉とその説明をつけたしました。「反対」を"reject"から"oppose"に変えました。・セミコロンを省くべく、文の構造を少し変えました。
sen.e: Since Roju (a member of shogun's council of elders) Masanori INABA opposed Ujiharu's succession to the family headship for that reason, an exceptional condition that Ujiharu was not allowed to succeed the family headship continued for a while.

sen.j: しかし、北条一族の運動により大老の酒井忠清の取り成しで、氏治は新たに藩を立てるという名目で1万石が与えられて継ぐこととなった。
sen.e: However, with help from the Tairo (chief minister) Tadakiyo Sakai, who was convinced by the HOJO family, Ujiharu was awarded with 10,000 Goku (crop yields) under the pretext of establishing a new clan and thus was able to succeed the Sayama clan.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However, with help from the Tairo (chief minister) Tadakiyo Sakai, who was convinced by the HOJO family, Ujiharu was awarded with 10,000 Goku (crop yields) under the pretext of establishing a new domain, and thus he was able to succeed Sayama Domain.

However, with help from the Tairo (chief minister) Tadakiyo Sakai, who was convinced by the HOJO family, Ujiharu was awarded with 10,000 Goku (crop yields) under the pretext of establishing a new domain, and thus he was able to succeed Sayama Domain.

sen.j: 近江国水口城番、山城国二条城大番頭などを歴任した後の元禄元年（1688年）に御側衆に任じられている。
sen.e: He was appointed the Osobashu (Shogun's aid) in 1688 after he successively held various position including the Joban (castle administrator) of the Minakuchi-jo Castle in Omi province and the Obangashira of the Nijo-jo Castle in Yamashiro Province.

He was appointed the Osobashu (Shogun's aid) in 1688 after he successively held various position including the Joban (castle administrator) of the Minakuchi-jo Castle in Omi province and the Obangashira (Chief guard) of the Nijo-jo Castle in Yamashiro Province.
sen.cmt: 「大番頭」の定訳はありませんしたが、下記ウェブサイトを参考に説明をつけました。http://www.weblio.jp/content/%E5%A4%A7%E7%95%AA%E9%A0%AD
sen.e: He was appointed the Osobashu (Shogun's aid) in 1688 after he successively held various position including the Joban (castle administrator) of the Minakuchi-jo Castle in Omi province and the Obangashira (Chief guard) of the Nijo-jo Castle in Yamashiro Province.
He died on May 29, 1696.
He died on July 10, 1695.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ暦に訂正しました。
sen.e: He died on July 10, 1695.
His age at death was 58 years old.
He was 58 years old when he died.
sen.cmt: こちらのほうが自然かと思い、直しました。
sen.e: He was 58 years old when he died.

sen.j: 後を弟で養子の北条氏朝が継いだ。
sen.e: Ujitomo HOJO, Ujiharu's younger brother and an adapted child, succeeded the clan.
Ujitomo HOJO, Ujiharu's younger brother and an adapted child, succeeded the domain.
Ujitomo HOJO, Ujiharu's younger brother and an adapted child, succeeded the domain.
